expo.name: Rainworks
expo.description: View the location of rainworks around the world. https://rain.works/

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to the camera to upload photos of rainworks.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photos to upload photos of rainworks.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Enabling location services will make it easier to find and submit rainworks near you.
